What are the treatments for Adult Soft Tissue Sarcoma ?,"Key Points
                    - There are different types of treatment for patients with adult soft tissue sarcoma.    - Three types of standard treatment are used:         - Surgery     - Radiation therapy     - Chemotherapy        - New types of treatment are being tested in clinical trials.          -
